experience.title: Analyst
experience.description: part of Portfolio’s group, Principal Investment franchise of Deutsche Bank investing in Secured and Unsecured Non performing loan portfolios across Europe and EMEA

experience.title: Summer Intern
experience.description: I back-tested 2 trading strategies(Namely F-score and Betting against Beta) and studied their impact in Indian markets. Learned various valuation techniques like DCF, APV etc and applied them to solve case studies based on M&A, dividend payout decision, taking up of new projects. I also helped Research Associates with the ongoing research projects at ISB. Performed univariate and multivariate analysis. used machine learning models to test the robustness of the results. Scrapped data from many websites and organised it as panelled data for analysis.

experience.title: Media Coordinator branding and relations cell, IIT Kharagpur
experience.description: During my tenure of associate member at Branding and relations cell,IIT kharagpur. I mostly contributed by bringing in new fresh ideas to uplift the brand value of IIT Kharagpur. Now as a student member I am responsible for solely conducting mega events like YIP(YOUNG INNOVATORS PROGRAM)etc, to gather sponsorship and to make the event a success.

experience.title: Image Processing Workshop
experience.description: Successfully completed the seven-day workshop IEEE certified workshop in Image processing conducted by Technology Robotix Society, IIT Kharagpur. OpenCV library was applied to perform various image modifications like increasing its brightness, detecting blobs and Hough transform. A robot was made to traverse a path detected from an image. A face recognition algorithm was implemented to detect human faces from a video.

projects: [{"title":"Identification and Prediction of Sleeping Beauties in nature ","start_date":"Sep 2019","end_date":"Present","description":"Mentor: Prof. Animesh Mukherjee , Associate Professor, Department of Computer Science and Engineering IIT Kharagpur.A paper is termed as sleeping beauty if it remains dormant for many years but suddenly starts receiving a large no. of incitations, I am predicting the probability of a paper to be a sleeping beauty and it’s “sleep time”, Scraped data from various APIs to gather 46947044 data points, important columns of incitations, outcitation, year of publication, etc were recognized using feature selection techniques, further mapped the data columns with primary Ids allotted, Graphically analyzed the data using matplotlib and seaborn to get the avg. Incitation per paper of 3.778 and made the matrix of author id and years of publication"},{},{}]
